function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on 5G-based systems for remote work and education may contribute to increased dependence on technology for human interaction.","Impact":"Decreased human-to-human interaction can lead to social isolation and potential mental health issues.","Mitigation":"Encourage regular in-person interactions and promote a healthy balance between virtual and physical interactions.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Remote workers, students, and individuals dependent on virtual interactions.","Owner":"Organizations, educational institutions, and communities"},{"Description":"Deployment of 5G-based robots and unmanned vehicles for medical care and delivery may reduce the need for human presence, potentially impacting human labor and employment in these sectors.","Impact":"Job displacement and reduced opportunities for human employment in medical care and delivery services.","Mitigation":"Training and upskilling programs for individuals affected by automation, and regulations to ensure a fair balance between automation and human employment.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Healthcare workers, delivery personnel, and individuals employed in related sectors.","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and delivery service providers"},{"Description":"Rapid adoption of 5G-based technologies may lead to increased reliance on efficient but vulnerable digital infrastructure, posing a risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","Impact":"Potential compromise of sensitive medical and logistical data, disruption of services, and privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Investment in robust cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and employee training on cybersecurity best practices.","Technologies":"Cybersecurity solutions, encryption technologies, and secure communication protocols.","People":"Users of 5G-based systems, organizations managing medical resources, and logistics providers.","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, healthcare organizations, and logistics companies"}]}
